description: Top third of a Horizontal Triptych layout. Döbeln on horseback raises his sword high, the signal for counterfire. His black headband is sharply lit against the smoke-filled sky. Swedish artillery crews stand ready, linstocks glowing at cannon mouths.
narration: At Döbeln’s command, the field erupts in thunder.
info: Page 8 – Counterfire Ordered. PageType: Horizontal Triptych (3 panels). Scene (panel 1): Döbeln gives the signal for counterfire.
